author: CMSTrackerDPG
body:
#### PR description:

In this PR duplicate pixels in the clusterizer code are added together instead of taking the last occurence. The goal of the PR is to bring the CPU legacy code in sync with the GPU code as a follow up to the discussions in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/35376 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37359

No changes are expected in MC samples. In the data there could be some tiny differences in case some duplicate pixels appear.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles :)
title: Add duplicate pixels
